messages.msgSnippet: Congrats Kelly! Fantastic news. I hope you manage to get enough sleep to stay sane and therefore enjoy him!  Julie ... owner, ... an ...
messages.messageBody:
Congrats Kelly! Fantastic news.
I hope you manage to get enough sleep to stay sane and therefore enjoy him!
<g>

Julie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] a new unschooler is born
messages.msgSnippet: ... Thank you Mary and everyone for the good wishes. He s a sweetie, even if I do say so myself.  -grin-  Even his big brothers think he s charming. Now the
messages.messageBody:
>Whoohoo Kelly!!!! Congratulations!!!! I'm so happy for you and he sounds
>wonderful. Enjoy my dear. I'm envious.
>Mary B.

Thank you Mary and everyone for the good wishes.

He's a sweetie, even if I do say so myself. -grin- Even his big brothers
think he's charming.

Now the great adjustment begins.

Kelly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kelly Lenhart" <mina@...>
To: <Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 28, 2003 1:19 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-Discussion] a new unschooler is born


> Alexander William Lenhart was born at 4:02 AM on August 24. He weighted 8
> lbs and 4 oz. He's got a big shock of black hair and is cute as a button.
> I got home Monday afternoon and all is well. Except, of course, that I am
> now realizing I was out of my mind to do this...-grin-
>
> Just thought I'd let people know that I won't be signing things "the
> pregnant one" any more.
>
> Kelly

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] a new unschooler is born
messages.msgSnippet: Congrats Kelly! He sounds wonderful. ~Rebecca Kelly Lenhart  wrote: Alexander William Lenhart was born at 4:02 AM on August 24. He weighted 8
messages.messageBody:
Congrats Kelly! He sounds wonderful.
~Rebecca

Kelly Lenhart <mina@...> wrote:
Alexander William Lenhart was born at 4:02 AM on August 24. He weighted 8
lbs and 4 oz. He's got a big shock of black hair and is cute as a button.
I got home Monday afternoon and all is well. Except, of course, that I am
now realizing I was out of my mind to do this...-grin-

Just thought I'd let people know that I won't be signing things "the
pregnant one" any more.

Kelly

messages.msgSnippet: Kelly, How wonderful! Congratulations. :-) Barb E Happiness is a butterfly, which, when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit
messages.messageBody:
Kelly,
How wonderful! Congratulations. :-)


Barb E
"Happiness is a butterfly, which, when pursued, is always
just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down
quietly, may alight upon you."

- Nathaniel Hawthorne, Author

messages.subject: a new unschooler is born
messages.msgSnippet: Alexander William Lenhart was born at 4:02 AM on August 24. He weighted 8 lbs and 4 oz.  He s got a big shock of black hair and is cute as a button. I got home
messages.messageBody:
Alexander William Lenhart was born at 4:02 AM on August 24. He weighted 8
lbs and 4 oz. He's got a big shock of black hair and is cute as a button.
I got home Monday afternoon and all is well. Except, of course, that I am
now realizing I was out of my mind to do this...-grin-

Just thought I'd let people know that I won't be signing things "the
pregnant one" any more.

Kelly
